title: Nerve Wracking
body: Those matches man... Way too close. So glad C9 won in the end though!

replies.body:
THESE 3 GAMES WERE INTENSE.  i dont think c9 actually wanted to play ori or any other champ yet so the can have more secrets. meteos spammed j4 he doesnt want to pull out the zac yet. that last teamfight made me jump out my seat.

uol this is gonna be a fun game.
